question_text: A technician is connecting a front panel header but can’t find labels on the case wires. What’s the BEST course of action?
answer_options: Plug them in randomly and test functionality
Use a multimeter to check voltage
Refer to the case manual or manufacturer’s diagram
Skip connecting the front panel entirely
correct_answer: Refer to the case manual or manufacturer’s diagram
explanation: When pin labels are missing, always refer to manufacturer documentation to avoid incorrect connections or missed functionality.
